ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISCHANGED(FirstName ), ISCHANGED( LastName ), ISCHANGED(MiddleName), ISCHANGED(Email), ISCHANGED(Suffix), ISCHANGED(Country__c)), OR($Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Community User Login', $Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login', $Profile.Name = 'PRM Unauthorized Partner User Login' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to modify these fields.
